commentAnnotations.text: Procedures specific to screening sites (only in the US) detailed in Section 8
ALT = alanine aminotransferase; AST = aspartate aminotransferase; IB = Investigator's Brochure; PK = pharmacokinetics; WD = Wilson disease
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Table 3: Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy

commentAnnotations.text: CRF = case report form; CRU = clinical research unit; EOS = End of Study; SoA = Schedule of Activities
ICF = informed consent form; PD = pharmacodynamic; PK = pharmacokinetic

Total molybdenum and PUF molybdenum concentration-time profiles on Day 28 after the last 15 mg ALXN1840 dose will be extrapolated to Day 29 (0-24 hr) and subtracted from the observed Day 29 concentration-time profiles after the first 30 mg
Samples collected within Â± 10% or 30 min, whichever is less, of the scheduled time will not be considered a protocol deviation
